title.en: The New Warriors are Stubborn, the Seven Stars

altTitles.ja: 新武者頑駄無 天星七人衆

description.en:
The twin brothers of King Ryuusei and Reiichi, who were raised by Kensei, who is both a teacher and a parent. Reiichi, who continues his journey to save his brother, Meteor King, who has been kidnapped by the Maten Dark Party, meets friends who have the power of the Seven Stars, as well as enemies... He safely rescues his brother and defeats the Maten Party. Is it possible!? The popular "Deluxe Bonbon" and "Comic Bonbon", and the 13 volumes published by "Bonbon KC", the "Masahiro Kanda Musha Gundam Series" are being reissued with a total of 7 new editions. "New Edition Shin Musha Gundam Tensei Shichininshu" includes all episodes from Volumes 1 and 2 of Bonbon KC's "Shin Musha Gundam Tensei Shichininshu".


Reiichi, who continues his journey to save his twin brother, Meteor King, who was kidnapped by the Dark Party, will he be able to rescue his brother and defeat the Demon Party!? "Masahiro Kanda Musha Gundam Series", which gained popularity with "Bonbon KC" and was published in 13 volumes, reappears in all 7 new editions!! ” contains all episodes of Volumes 1 and 2 of the Bonbon KC version of “Shin Musha Gundam Tensei Shichininshu”.
